app.title: Mail
msg.create.dialog.title: New Mail
msg.create.label.subject: Subject
folder.empty.title: Folder is empty
folder.empty.text.inbox: The Inbox folder stores all incoming emails that you have received from 3NWeb services and classic mail services.
folder.empty.text.outbox: The Outbox folder temporarily holds emails that have been sent but are still in the process of being delivered.
folder.empty.text.draft: The Draft folder holds emails you started writing but haven’t sent yet — they’re saved for you to finish and send later.
folder.empty.text.sent: The Sent folder contains copies of emails that you have successfully sent to others.
folder.empty.text.trash: The Trash folder temporarily holds deleted emails. Messages stay here until they are permanently removed either manually or after a set period.
msg.no.selected.part2: Select a message to view its contents.
msg.sending.canceled.label: Sending canceled
msg.sending.error.label: Sending error
msg.sending.progress.label: Sending in Progress...
msg.sending.error.msgTooBig: this message is bigger than allowed
msg.sending.error.inboxIsFull: mailbox of this recipient is full
msg.content.header.preflight.error: The message could not be sent to the specified recipients.
msg.delete.permanently.title: Confirm Permanent Deletion
msg.delete.permanently.string1: Are you sure you want to permanently delete selected message(s)?
msg.download.title: Select a folder for downloading
msg.download.file.title: Save file
msg.preflight.dialog.title: Preflight processing
msg.preflight.dialog.processing.text: Preparing to send... Checking recipient availability. Please wait.
msg.preflight.dialog.subtitle: The following address is currently unavailable, and messages cannot be delivered to it:
msg.preflight.dialog.question: Would you like to send the message anyway?
msg.reply.title: Original message
msg.forward.title: Forwarded message
